description: Retrieves a list that describes one or more specified Amazon WorkSpaces clients.

nested_items.name: ClientPropertiesList
nested_items.description: Information about the specified Amazon WorkSpaces clients.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource identifier, in the form of a directory ID.

nested_items.name: ClientProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon WorkSpaces client.

nested_items.name: ReconnectEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can cache their credentials on the Amazon WorkSpaces client. When enabled, users can choose to reconnect to their WorkSpaces without re-entering their credentials.

nested_items.name: LogUploadEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether users can upload diagnostic log files of Amazon WorkSpaces client directly to WorkSpaces to troubleshoot issues when using the WorkSpaces client. When enabled, the log files will be sent to WorkSpaces automatically and will be applied to all users in the specified directory.
